name: Testify
description: An AI-powered platform designed for comprehensive IELTS and TOEIC test preparation, featuring automated scoring, real-time feedback collection, and intelligent learning analytics. Built with cutting-edge technologies to deliver personalized learning experiences.

responsibilities: Architected Django Backend with Django REST Framework and PostgreSQL
Developed Next.js 15 Frontend with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
Implemented OpenAI GPT-4 for IELTS/TOEIC Writing & Speaking evaluation
Integrated Whisper AI for automated speech-to-text transcription
Built comprehensive test management system for IELTS & TOEIC modules

features: AI-Powered IELTS & TOEIC scoring with OpenAI GPT-4 integration
Real-time speech-to-text transcription using Whisper AI
Comprehensive test management for both IELTS and TOEIC formats
Automated feedback generation with detailed band score analysis
Multi-skill assessment covering Listening, Reading, Writing, Speaking

metrics: Supports full IELTS & TOEIC test structures with 100+ test modules
AI evaluation system achieving 94% accuracy in band score prediction
Processing 4 language skills with automated scoring capabilities
Docker-containerized deployment for scalable production environment
highlights: Built scalable Django backend with comprehensive IELTS/TOEIC models
Implemented OpenAI integration for automated Writing & Speaking evaluation
Created robust audio processing pipeline with Whisper AI transcription
Developed responsive Next.js frontend with TypeScript and modern UI components
